summary: Complete end-to-end testing of 5 KDP Book Creator bug fixes: book deletion cleanup, stock image generation, image interface visibility/deletion, export formatting, and page numbers. All critical bugs resolved successfully.

minor_issues.issue: Returns HTTP 200 instead of 201 for successful creation
minor_issues.impact: Minor - book creation works correctly, just wrong status code

ui_bugs.workaround: Button works but may need force=true for automation

passed_tests: Stock image generation with Unsplash/Picsum fallback
Book deletion with cleanup of images and exports
PDF export with page numbers and formatted content
Chapter images visible in interface (not just preview)
